modName: Breath of the Wild Music Replacer - DELETED
summary: Replaces over 50 of Skyrims songs with tracks from the Breath of the Wild sound track.
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿[/center][center][size=3][img]https://i.imgur.com/Zk0VarR.png[/img]﻿﻿[/size]
[color=yellow]
[size=4]Replaces over 50 tracks (as well as some sound effects!) from Skyrim with tracks from Breath of the Wild.[/size]
[/color][/center]

[center][size=3]Hello! This is my first mod and all it aims to do is replace Skyrim's music with a video game soundtrack I equally love.
To download all you have to do is drag the Data file into your Skyrim folder, found in steamapps/common/Skyrim.[/size][/center]
author: itsheart
